review: I have been a big ROKU fan for years and have had a couple of their 2XS & 3 models.  I used to carry a regular ROKU with me when I traveled for use in hotels and friends houses.  The ROKU 2 and 3 are compact and have a couple of features that the Stick does not have but the STICK takes up much less room in the suitcase. The ROKU is easier to set up than the other streamers I've tried and I do believe the ROKU has more available channels than any other streamer and they are constantly adding more.

review: BEWARE 90 day warranty and mine do not last more than 8 months. This is not the first one to break on me. When it works it is great but they do not last and I am a VERY angry customer. I cannot afford to spend $100 every few months on a new roku.After a few calls I asked for a supervisor and had to wait a while and he said just this once.. if I mail it in to them he will then mail me one out .. just this once. So, 2? 3? weeks with no tv.DON'T BUY A ROKU!!!edit: I got an Amazon Fire tv and am very happy with it and it has a 'normal' warranty and as a long time customer of Amazon I know they stand behind everything they sell.
